course.title: CSI 1390 Introduction to Computers (3 units)
course.desc: Computing and computers. Problem solving and algorithm development. Introduction to programming. Use of application, communication, and database software.Course Component: Laboratory, LectureThe courses ITI 1120, ITI 1121, GNG 1106, CSI 1306, CSI 1308, CSI 1390 cannot be combined for units.
